member.name: T:ParticleLibrary.Particle
member.summary: Base class for all particles. Inherit this class to create your own particle.

member.name: P:ParticleLibrary.Particle.Texture
member.summary: Texture path for a particle. Override this to specify a custom path.

member.name: P:ParticleLibrary.Particle.VisualPosition
member.summary: The visual position taking into account Main.screenPosition;

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.color
member.summary: The color of this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.frame
member.summary: The frame of this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.texture
member.summary: The texture for this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.SpawnAction
member.summary: Method to run when this particle is spawned.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.DeathAction
member.summary: Method to run when this particle is despawned.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.tileCollide
member.summary: Whether this particle should collide with tiles.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.scale
member.summary: The scale of this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.rotation
member.summary: The rotation of this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.opacity
member.summary: The opacity of this particle.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.gravity
member.summary: The gravity to apply to this particle's movement.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.timeLeft
member.summary: The amount of ticks (frames) this particle has left in its lifetime.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.ai
member.summary: An array of floats used to pass data to the particle on spawn.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.oldPos
member.summary: An array of old positions for this particle. Only used when instantiated in SetDefaults().

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.oldRot
member.summary: An array of old rotations for this particle. Only used when instantiated in SetDefaults().

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.oldCen
member.summary: An array of old centers, taking into account the width and height of this particle. Only used when instantiated in SetDefaults().

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.Particle.oldVel
member.summary: An array of old velocities for this particle. Only used when instantiated in SetDefaults().

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.PreAI
member.summary: This method runs before the particle is updated.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.AI
member.summary: This method runs as the particle is updated.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.PostAI
member.summary: This method runs after the particle is updated.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.PreDraw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color)
member.summary: This method runs before Draw. Return false to keep the Particle Manager from drawing your particle.
member.param: Draw position of the particle. This factors in Main.screenPosition.
The light color of the tile beneath this particle.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color)
member.summary: This method runs if PreDraw returns true. Provided SpriteBatch. Draw position of the particle. This factors in Main.screenPosition. The light color of the tile beneath this particle.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.PostDraw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color)
member.summary: This method runs after Draw is called. Provided SpriteBatch. Draw position of the particle. This factors in Main.screenPosition. The light color of the tile beneath this particle.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.Particle.Kill
member.summary: Kills a particle.

member.name: T:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager
member.summary: This class manages the particle system.

member.name: F:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager.particles
member.summary: A list that contains all active particles.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager.OnModLoad
member.summary: Runs after the library is loaded.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager.Unload
member.summary: Runs when the library is unloaded.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the current list of particles.

member.name: M:ParticleLibrary.ParticleManager.NewParticle(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,ParticleLibrary.Particle,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Spawns a new particle at the desired position.
member.param: The position to create a particle at.
The velocity to pass to the particle.
The type of particle. Use new MyParticle() to pass a type.
The color to use when drawing the particle.
The scale to use when drawing the particle.
